name: RunQuack
description:
It's a game about a ninja duck who wants to eat some ramen. 

He uses his kunai feather ability to open the doors, by hitting all the targets. Be carrefour because a mysterious creepy shadow follows him to steal his money.

Don't get caught !!!

Input : 

-Use the "A" and "D" key to move 

-Use the "SPACE" key to jump and double jump

-While moving, use the "SHIFT" key to dash

-Use the left MOUSE button to shoot kunai feathers
